## Reason

Explain why parity cannot be preserved directly.

## Impact

Describe behavior, safety, tooling, and interoperability impact.

## Alternatives Considered

List alternatives and why each was rejected.

## Scope

- Lean references:
- Rust references:
- Mismatch fingerprints (`covers`):

## Exit Criteria

Describe the condition under which this break can be removed.
